Created by Petrified Forest National Park Volunteer (VIP) Andrew Kearns.     Â          The Tourist, the Park Ranger, and the Petrified Forest   Loading the player...       Visit JWPlayer docs for keyboard shortcuts  Duration:5 minutes, 53 seconds  The Tourist, the Park Ranger, and the Petrified Forest Written and Read by Marge Post Illustrations by Tyra Olstad Inspired by Dr. Seuss' The Lorax, this story takes the reader into Petrified Forest National Park and addresses one of the park's most important resource issues, petrified wood theft.
